body.p: In Killerfiller you are supposed to inflect certain words from certain parts of speech in sentential contexts. You may choose level yourself, and e.g. work with possessive suffixes.
Parts of our resources are beta versions. This means that there may be errors in them. Feel free to send us corrections and suggestions for improvement! (oahpa@hum.uit.no)
Dárbbašat go veahki grammatihkain? Mana dása: Grammatihkka
